frontmatter.title: TypeScript / JavaScript Developer
frontmatter.description: Cyscale is a startup with offices in London (UK) and Cluj-Napoca (RO), activating in the cloud cybersecurity industry. We are looking for an experienced JavaScript developer.
frontmatter.seoDescription: Part of a dedicated and autonomous product team, committed to solving real problems for our customers. You will improve our application architecture, improve and expand our API, build new features for microservices and the frontend app, iterate on and fix bugs in existing features. You will participate in all phases of the product (discovery, delivery, iteration), and your performance will be measured on the satisfaction of our users.
